name: War Domain
description: Clerics of the War Domain are battle priests who channel divine power through steel and strategy, empowering allies and striking down foes in the name of conquest and duty.

1.name: War Domain Spells
1.description: You always have certain spells prepared at specific cleric levels.

1.name: Bonus Proficiencies
1.description: You gain proficiency with martial weapons and heavy armor.

1.name: War Priest
1.description: When you take the Attack action, you can make one weapon attack as a bonus action a limited number of times.

2.name: Channel Divinity: Guided Strike
2.description: You can gain a significant bonus to an attack roll after seeing the roll but before knowing the result.

6.name: Channel Divinity: War God's Blessing
6.description: You can use your Channel Divinity to help an allyâ€™s attack roll as a reaction.

8.name: Divine Strike
8.description: Once on each of your turns when you hit with a weapon attack, you deal extra weapon damage.

17.name: Avatar of Battle
17.description: You gain resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical weapons.
